version_description:
Now, even non-DBS and POSB customers can sign up for PayLah!.

Simply download, register and link a Singapore bank account to PayLah! and in minutes, you will have your own personal mobile wallet to use wherever, whenever!

New features have been added to enhance your PayLah! experience:
•  Pay with PayLah! for your online purchases securely and swiftly!
•  PayLah! is now available for everyone, even non-DBS and POSB customers!
 
Download PayLah! now, your trusted digital wallet app!

Now, you can view your PayLah! wallet balance and receive notifications on your Apple Watch.

New features have been added to enhance your PayLah! experience:
-Pay with PayLah! for your online purchases securely and swiftly!
-PayLah! is now available for everyone, even non-DBS and POSB customers!
-Minor Bug fixes
Download PayLah! now, your trusted digital wallet app!

Now, you can send money to your friends and accept payment requests from others on your Apple Watch.

-  Top up Prepaid SIM Cards from selected telcos.
-  Pay with PayLah! for your online purchases securely and swiftly!
-  Download PayLah! now, your trusted digital wallet app! Now available for everyone, even non-DBS and POSB customers!

Now, you can send money to your friends and accept payment requests from others on your Apple Watch.

-  Top up Prepaid SIM Cards from selected telcos.
-  Pay with PayLah! for your online purchases securely and swiftly!
-  Download PayLah! now, your trusted digital wallet app! Now available for everyone, even non-DBS and POSB customers!

We have made online PayLah! payments even more seamless with our new Easy Top-Up feature. What’s more, non-DBS and POSB customers can now top up their PayLah! wallets via online FAST transfers from other bank accounts.

We have made online PayLah! payments even more seamless with our new Easy Top-Up feature. What’s more, non-DBS and POSB customers can now top up their PayLah! wallets via online FAST transfers from other bank accounts.

We have made online PayLah! payments even more seamless with our new Easy Top-Up feature. What’s more, non-DBS and POSB customers can now top up their PayLah! wallets via online FAST transfers from other bank accounts.

Minor fixes have also been introduced to make the user experience even better!

We have made online PayLah! payments even more seamless with our new Easy Top-Up feature. What’s more, non-DBS and POSB customers can now top up their PayLah! wallets via online FAST transfers from other bank accounts.

Minor fixes have also been introduced to make the user experience even better!
Minor enhancements have been introduced to make the PayLah! wallet top-up experience even better!
NEW! We have simplified our sign-up page to make it easier for new users to register a PayLah! account! Other minor enhancements are also introduced to improve the performance of our app.

NEW! We have replaced the WhatsApp notification available after the Send Money with the native iOS sharing function.  You can now notify your friends that you have sent them money through any available messaging apps on your phone (e.g. SMS, WhatsApp, WeChat, Facebook Messenger, etc.)

NEW! You can now create a payment link that allows PayLah! users to pay you for items or services that you’re promoting online. This link can be shared through any available messaging apps on your phone or on social networks, messaging apps or blog shops.

Collect funds offline by using your personal QR Code.  Print it out or share it on your phone during meetups and you can collect funds without needing to disclose your mobile phone number. QR codes are also available for all payment links.

We have also introduced a QR scanner for users to scan quickly scan PayLah! QR Payment Links or eVouchers.

Collect funds offline by using your personal QR Code.  Print it out or share it on your phone during meetups and you can collect funds without needing to disclose your mobile phone number. QR codes are also available for all payment links.

We have also introduced a QR scanner for users to scan quickly scan PayLah! QR Payment Links or eVouchers.

Collect funds offline by using your personal QR Code.  Print it out or share it on your phone during meetups and you can collect funds without needing to disclose your mobile phone number. QR codes are also available for all payment links.

We have also introduced a QR scanner for users to scan quickly scan PayLah! QR Payment Links or eVouchers.

Easy Top-up will now automatically draw funds from your linked bank account if you have insufficient balance when sending funds, responding to a request for funds or making payment by scanning a QR code.

Now, even non-DBS and POSB customers can sign up for PayLah!.

Simply download, register and link a Singapore bank account to PayLah! and in minutes, you will have your own personal mobile wallet to use wherever, whenever!

Easy Top-up will now automatically draw funds from your linked bank account if you have insufficient balance when sending funds, responding to a request for funds or making payment by scanning a QR code.

We’ve also made login and password retrieval easier.

Introducing a new way to PayLah!: Just scan and PayLah! at selected merchants with the NETS QR Code.

If you’re new to PayLah! your first top up can now be made without your DBS iBanking Secure Device.

Tell us what you think of these features by leaving some feedback on the PayLah app.

From 10 July, you will be able to send money to PayNow registered accounts using PayLah!

Scan and PayLah! at over 3,000 NETs and PayLah! QR enabled merchants islandwide.

From 10 July, you will be able to send money to PayNow registered accounts using PayLah!

Scan and PayLah! at over 3,000 NETs and PayLah! QR enabled merchants islandwide.

• Brand new interface:  Besides the new look we’ve added small tweaks to make sending money easier.

• Auto Debit:  Avoid the hassle of topping up.  Enable this and funds will be deducted directly from your linked bank account when you have insufficient balance.

• Scan and PayLah! on Comfort Taxis, selected NETs merchants and hawker centres.

• Invite friends to PayLah!: Get S$5 when you successfully refer someone with your unique referral code

• Invite a business: Refer your favourite small businesses to accept PayLah! – the fuss-free mode of payment via QR Code

• Brand new interface:  Besides the new look we’ve added small tweaks to make sending money easier.

• Auto Debit:  Avoid the hassle of topping up.  Enable this and funds will be deducted directly from your linked bank account when you have insufficient balance.

• Scan and PayLah! on Comfort Taxis, selected NETs merchants and hawker centres.

• Invite friends to PayLah!: Get S$5 when you successfully refer someone with your unique referral code

• Invite a business: Refer your favourite small businesses to accept PayLah! – the fuss-free mode of payment via QR Code

• Brand new interface:  Besides the new look we’ve added small tweaks to make sending money easier

• Fixed stability issues associated with the Inbox and the loading of contact names.

• Auto Debit:  Enable this and funds will be deducted directly from your linked bank account when you have insufficient balance

• Invite friends to PayLah!: Get S$5 when you successfully refer someone with your unique referral code

• Invite a business: Refer your favourite small businesses to accept PayLah! QR Code

• Fixed stability issues associated with the Inbox, the loading of contact names and repeated request of contact permission

• Fixed issues associated with Scan & Pay in taxis

• Scan and pay with NETs QR or PayLah! Business app generated QR at your favourite hawkers and shops

• FaceID support for iPhone X, so you can securely sign into PayLah! and make your purchases —with just a glance

• Enhanced eAng Bao experience

• Enable Auto Debit and funds will be deducted directly from your linked bank account when there is insufficient balance in your PayLah! wallet

Latest updates based on your feedback:
• Brought back the ability to store frequently paid bills as Favourites
• Improved the layout of frequently used functions such as Top Up and Transfer to Account so you can better manage your wallet
• Simplified the way you sync contacts, so you have greater control over how you can add payees
• Improved  the log out experience, so you have greater peace of mind that your session has ended securely
• Implemented bug and stability fixes for third-party payments 

Recent updates:
• Fingerprint authentication now available on more devices
• Scan and pay with NETs QR at your favourite hawkers and shops
• Enhanced eAng Bao experience
• Enable Auto Debit for funds to be deducted directly from your linked account when there is insufficient balance in your PayLah! wallet

Latest Updates:
• Fixed sporadic issues associated with Send Money / Request for Funds transactions

• Enable Auto Debit and funds will be deducted directly from your linked bank account when there is insufficient balance in your PayLah! wallet

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience that allows you to:
• purchase your movie tickets from Golden Village.
• get travel insurance while on the go.

Recent enhancements:
• QR Ang Bao: Try a new way of gifting this Chinese New Year! Simply scan QR, load and gift. 
   Get these limited edition QR Ang Baos at DBS/POSB branches or pop-up ATMs from 25 January 2019 onwards.
• Implemented bug and stability fixes for a seamless payment experience.

Latest updates:
• Introduced a seamless, in-app experience for the purchase of Golden Village movie tickets and TravellerShield Plus insurance

• Implemented bug and stability fixes for a smoother payment experience

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience:

• Introducing new ways to manage your outgoing payments notifications
• Registration made simple and instant with MyInfo
• Purchase your movie tickets from Golden Village
• Get your insurance plans on the go. Stay protected with TravelShield Plus and Mobile Protect
• Seamless transactions on ChopeDeals with great savings on over 500 dining vouchers and easy restaurant bookings
• Implemented bug and stability fixes for a seamless payment experience

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience:
QR Gift: Go cashless this Hari Raya! Simply scan, load and gift a duit raya via QR Gift. 
Get the limited edition QR Gift cards at DBS/POSB branches from 18 May 2019 onwards.

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience:

• QR Gift: New features introduced to bring you greater convenience. Scan to load up to 10 QR Gift cards at a time. Get chances to play TapLah! when you gift or receive QR Gift cards during Chinese New Year and win up to $888.
• Parents, you now have the option to register PayLah! for your child using your MyInfo profile via SingPass.
• Getting your bills paid has never been easier. Now with AXS on DBS PayLah!, you can have total control of your bills whenever, wherever!
• Enjoy instant parking rewards with the DBS X VivoRewards Instant Rewards Programme.
• View your Credit Card details, Rewards balances, and offset your Credit Card transactions with your DBS Points/ POSB Daily$.
Good News! This release includes improvements and bug fixes for a better experience. Update now to enjoy the latest version of our app. Thanks for choosing PayLah!

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience which includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

PayLah! is supported on devices running on iOS 10.0 or later. Please upgrade your iOS to continue using the app.

Good News! We are bringing you a new home screen design for an
awesome user experience. Enjoy it now by updating your app to the latest version!

View your Credit Card details, Rewards balances, Credit Card deals and offset your PayLah! and Credit Card transactions with your DBS Points/ POSB Daily$. Get more rewards as you spend.

Thanks for choosing DBS PayLah!

Good News! You can now book a ride on PayLah! with ComfortDelGro Taxi or Gojek or order a meal from KFC. Update your app to the latest version to enjoy these services. 

Plus, view your Credit Card details, Rewards balances, Credit Card deals and offset your Credit Card transactions with your DBS Points/ POSB Daily$. Get more rewards as you spend. 

Thanks for choosing DBS PayLah!

Good News! You can now book a ride on PayLah! with ComfortDelGro Taxi or Gojek or order a meal from KFC. Expect new partners to come onboard with more rewards this month! Update your app to the latest version to enjoy these services.

Plus, view your Credit Card details, Rewards balances, Credit Card deals and offset your Credit Card transactions with your DBS Points/ POSB Daily$. Get more rewards as you spend.

Thanks for choosing DBS PayLah!

Good news! DBS PayLah! now accepts FavePay QR. Earn cashback by scanning FavePay QRs, or at Hawker Centres and 80,000 other acceptance points with NETSQR and PayNow QR.

 Book a ride with ComfortDelGro and Gojek, or order in meals with KFC and WhyQ. Buy tickets, pay bills, and more!

 Credit Card users - View your Card details, Rewards balances, Card deals and offset your Card transactions with your DBS Points/ POSB Daily$. Get more rewards as you spend.

 Thanks for choosing DBS PayLah!

Good news! All your favourite Card features are now on DBS PayLah!

DBS/POSB Card users –You can now join Spend & Win promotions to receive sure-win prizes. View your Card details, Rewards balances, Card deals and offset your Card transactions with your DBS Points/ POSB Daily$. Get more rewards as you spend.

Also, you can now access your monthly statements electronically through PayLah! eStatements.

Thanks for choosing DBS PayLah!

Good news! Card Rewards are now on PayLah! Join Spend & Win promotions, view card deals, offset transactions using your DBS Points/POSB Daily $, all in one everyday app.

Plus, access digibankapp for all your banking services from PayLah! with a one-time login. You can also conveniently apply for banking products like credit cards, Cashline, instalment payment plans and more.

Quick Access: Now you have personalisation and more convenience at your finger tips! Your last clicked partner icons will now appear in Quick Access (first row) to make your everyday easier with PayLah!
 
Thank you for choosing DBS PayLah!

Good news! You can now send money overseas with PayLah!. Send money instantly to anyone registered with Thailand’s PromptPay service.

Quick Access: Now you have personalisation and more convenience at your finger tips! Your last clicked partner icons will now appear in Quick Access (first row) to make your everyday easier with PayLah!

Thank you for choosing DBS PayLah!

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience:

Bug fixes and improvements

We’ve enhanced the PayLah! in-app experience:

Bug fixes and improvements

As part of continuous improvement, we have optimized the login experience to allow PayLah! App to launch faster than before.

Jailbroken devices: Do note that PayLah! Will not be accessible from jailbroken devices due to regulatory requirements. Jailbreaking makes your device prone to security vulnerabilities.

Thank you for choosing DBS PayLah!
